name: everblooms hat
sizes_available: preemie, newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-24 months, small child (3-5 years), child (6-10 years), teen (adult small), adult medium, adult large
notes:
the everblooms hat is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern worked top-down in one piece. this design uses half double crochet, double crochet, and single crochet stitches. available in sizes preemie to adult, with a matching scarf pattern.
